      List<Values> toTuple(ITuple input, List<Column> columns)
      Converts a DB row to a list of storm values that can be emitted.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.storm.jdbc.mapper.JdbcMapper

        getColumns

    • Method Detail

      • toTuple

        List<Values> toTuple(ITuple input,
                     List<Column> columns)

        Converts a DB row to a list of storm values that can be emitted. This is done to allow a single storm input tuple and a single DB row to result in multiple output values.

        Parameters:
        input - the input tuple.
        columns - list of columns that represents a row
        Returns:
        a List of storm values that can be emitted. Each item in list is emitted as an output tuple.

      • declareOutputFields

        void declareOutputFields(OutputFieldsDeclarer declarer)

        declare what are the fields that this code will output.

        Parameters:
        declarer -
